title: Bricked by OTA-update. Boot loop in bootloader: ERROR: Slot Unbootable: Load Error. Any fixes?
content:
My Pixel 2 phone got OTA-update after which it is unable to start. All I get is boot loop to bootloader with message

ERROR: Slot Unbootable: Load Error

Device is OEM locked and unable to get any progress with fastboot-tool. Is there any possibility to retrieve data from phone?
